localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Tree Runner d'Allbird est une basket légère et aérée, conçue à partir de fibres d'eucalyptus de source responsable, qui sont douces et soyeuses au toucher et qui ont un effet rafraîchissant sur la peau. Ces chaussures sont parfaites pour les tenues décontractées au quotidien, la marche et le temps plus chaud.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Allbirds Tree Runner sono le nostre sneakers traspiranti e leggere realizzate in fibra di eucalipto di origine etica. Sono lisce come seta e fresche sulla pelle. Perfette per essere indossate ogni giorno, per passeggiare e per le temperature più calde.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: Tree Runnerは、責任を持って調達されたユーカリの木の繊維を使用した、通気性の良い軽量スニーカーです。シルクのように滑らかで涼しい肌触りで、暖かい日のウォーキング、お出かけに最適です。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: 올버즈 Tree Runner는 통기성이 뛰어나고 가벼운 스니커즈로 유칼립투스 나무 섬유를 사용해 피부에 부드럽고 시원합니다. 따뜻한 계절에 완벽한 데일리 워킹화로 캐주얼 웨어와 어울립니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Allbirds Tree Runner is een ademende en lichte sneaker gemaakt van verantwoord gewonnen eucalyptusboomvezels die zijdezacht en fris aanvoelt op je huid. Deze schoenen zijn perfect voor elke dag, om te wandelen, en bij warmer weer.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 体贴入微的时尚休闲鞋，轻盈及透气舒适感，是阳光下跋涉的理想选择。

description: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fibre that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.

localizedDescription.de-DE: Der Allbirds Tree Runner ist ein luftig-leichter Sneaker aus verantwortungsvoll beschafften Eukalyptusfasern, die sich seidig-weich anfühlen und zudem einen kühlenden Effekt auf der Haut haben. Am besten eignet sich dieser Sneaker als Freizeitschuh bei wärmerem Wetter.
localizedDescription.en-AU: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fibre that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-CA: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fibre that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-EU: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fibre that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-GB: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fibre that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-NZ: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fibre that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-US: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fiber that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Tree Runner d'Allbird est une basket légère et aérée, conçue à partir de fibres d'eucalyptus de source responsable, qui sont douces et soyeuses au toucher et qui ont un effet rafraîchissant sur la peau. Ces chaussures sont parfaites pour les tenues décontractées au quotidien, la marche et le temps plus chaud.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Allbirds Tree Runner sono le nostre sneakers traspiranti e leggere realizzate in fibra di eucalipto di origine etica. Sono lisce come seta e fresche sulla pelle. Perfette per essere indossate ogni giorno, per passeggiare e per le temperature più calde.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: Tree Runnerは、責任を持って調達されたユーカリの木の繊維を使用した、通気性の良い軽量スニーカーです。シルクのように滑らかで涼しい肌触りで、暖かい日のウォーキング、お出かけに最適です。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: 올버즈 Tree Runner는 통기성이 뛰어나고 가벼운 스니커즈로 유칼립투스 나무 섬유를 사용해 피부에 부드럽고 시원합니다. 따뜻한 계절에 완벽한 데일리 워킹화로 캐주얼 웨어와 어울립니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Allbirds Tree Runner is een ademende en lichte sneaker gemaakt van verantwoord gewonnen eucalyptusboomvezels die zijdezacht en fris aanvoelt op je huid. Deze schoenen zijn perfect voor elke dag, om te wandelen, en bij warmer weer.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 体贴入微的时尚休闲鞋，轻盈及透气舒适感，是阳光下跋涉的理想选择。

description: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fibre that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.

localizedDescription.de-DE: Der Allbirds Tree Runner ist ein luftig-leichter Sneaker aus verantwortungsvoll beschafften Eukalyptusfasern, die sich seidig-weich anfühlen und zudem einen kühlenden Effekt auf der Haut haben. Am besten eignet sich dieser Sneaker als Freizeitschuh bei wärmerem Wetter.
localizedDescription.en-AU: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fibre that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-CA: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fibre that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-EU: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fibre that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-GB: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fibre that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-NZ: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fibre that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-US: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fiber that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Tree Runner d'Allbird est une basket légère et aérée, conçue à partir de fibres d'eucalyptus de source responsable, qui sont douces et soyeuses au toucher et qui ont un effet rafraîchissant sur la peau. Ces chaussures sont parfaites pour les tenues décontractées au quotidien, la marche et le temps plus chaud.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Allbirds Tree Runner sono le nostre sneakers traspiranti e leggere realizzate in fibra di eucalipto di origine etica. Sono lisce come seta e fresche sulla pelle. Perfette per essere indossate ogni giorno, per passeggiare e per le temperature più calde.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: Tree Runnerは、責任を持って調達されたユーカリの木の繊維を使用した、通気性の良い軽量スニーカーです。シルクのように滑らかで涼しい肌触りで、暖かい日のウォーキング、お出かけに最適です。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: 올버즈 Tree Runner는 통기성이 뛰어나고 가벼운 스니커즈로 유칼립투스 나무 섬유를 사용해 피부에 부드럽고 시원합니다. 따뜻한 계절에 완벽한 데일리 워킹화로 캐주얼 웨어와 어울립니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Allbirds Tree Runner is een ademende en lichte sneaker gemaakt van verantwoord gewonnen eucalyptusboomvezels die zijdezacht en fris aanvoelt op je huid. Deze schoenen zijn perfect voor elke dag, om te wandelen, en bij warmer weer.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 体贴入微的时尚休闲鞋，轻盈及透气舒适感，是阳光下跋涉的理想选择。

description: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fibre that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.

localizedDescription.de-DE: Der Allbirds Tree Runner ist ein luftig-leichter Sneaker aus verantwortungsvoll beschafften Eukalyptusfasern, die sich seidig-weich anfühlen und zudem einen kühlenden Effekt auf der Haut haben. Am besten eignet sich dieser Sneaker als Freizeitschuh bei wärmerem Wetter.
localizedDescription.en-AU: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fibre that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-CA: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fibre that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-EU: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fibre that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-GB: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fibre that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-NZ: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fibre that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-US: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fiber that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Tree Runner d'Allbird est une basket légère et aérée, conçue à partir de fibres d'eucalyptus de source responsable, qui sont douces et soyeuses au toucher et qui ont un effet rafraîchissant sur la peau. Ces chaussures sont parfaites pour les tenues décontractées au quotidien, la marche et le temps plus chaud.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Allbirds Tree Runner sono le nostre sneakers traspiranti e leggere realizzate in fibra di eucalipto di origine etica. Sono lisce come seta e fresche sulla pelle. Perfette per essere indossate ogni giorno, per passeggiare e per le temperature più calde.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: Tree Runnerは、責任を持って調達されたユーカリの木の繊維を使用した、通気性の良い軽量スニーカーです。シルクのように滑らかで涼しい肌触りで、暖かい日のウォーキング、お出かけに最適です。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: 올버즈 Tree Runner는 통기성이 뛰어나고 가벼운 스니커즈로 유칼립투스 나무 섬유를 사용해 피부에 부드럽고 시원합니다. 따뜻한 계절에 완벽한 데일리 워킹화로 캐주얼 웨어와 어울립니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Allbirds Tree Runner is een ademende en lichte sneaker gemaakt van verantwoord gewonnen eucalyptusboomvezels die zijdezacht en fris aanvoelt op je huid. Deze schoenen zijn perfect voor elke dag, om te wandelen, en bij warmer weer.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 体贴入微的时尚休闲鞋，轻盈及透气舒适感，是阳光下跋涉的理想选择。

localizedDescription.ko-KR: 올버즈 Tree Runner는 통기성이 뛰어나고 가벼운 스니커즈로 유칼립투스 나무 섬유를 사용해 피부에 부드럽고 시원합니다. 따뜻한 계절에 완벽한 데일리 워킹화로 캐주얼 웨어와 어울립니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Allbirds Tree Runner is een ademende en lichte sneaker gemaakt van verantwoord gewonnen eucalyptusboomvezels die zijdezacht en fris aanvoelt op je huid. Deze schoenen zijn perfect voor elke dag, om te wandelen, en bij warmer weer.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 体贴入微的时尚休闲鞋，轻盈及透气舒适感，是阳光下跋涉的理想选择。

description: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fibre that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.

localizedDescription.de-DE: Der Allbirds Tree Runner ist ein luftig-leichter Sneaker aus verantwortungsvoll beschafften Eukalyptusfasern, die sich seidig-weich anfühlen und zudem einen kühlenden Effekt auf der Haut haben. Am besten eignet sich dieser Sneaker als Freizeitschuh bei wärmerem Wetter.
localizedDescription.en-AU: The Allbirds Tree Runner is a breathable and lightweight sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fibre that feels silky smooth and cool on your skin. These shoes are perfect for everyday casual wear, walking, and warmer weather.

localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Tree Runner d'Allbird est une basket légère et aérée, conçue à partir de fibres d'eucalyptus de source responsable, qui sont douces et soyeuses au toucher et qui ont un effet rafraîchissant sur la peau. Ces chaussures sont parfaites pour les tenues décontractées au quotidien, la marche et le temps plus chaud.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Allbirds Tree Runner sono le nostre sneakers traspiranti e leggere realizzate in fibra di eucalipto di origine etica. Sono lisce come seta e fresche sulla pelle. Perfette per essere indossate ogni giorno, per passeggiare e per le temperature più calde.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: Tree Runnerは、責任を持って調達されたユーカリの木の繊維を使用した、通気性の良い軽量スニーカーです。シルクのように滑らかで涼しい肌触りで、暖かい日のウォーキング、お出かけに最適です。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: 올버즈 Tree Runner는 통기성이 뛰어나고 가벼운 스니커즈로 유칼립투스 나무 섬유를 사용해 피부에 부드럽고 시원합니다. 따뜻한 계절에 완벽한 데일리 워킹화로 캐주얼 웨어와 어울립니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Allbirds Tree Runner is een ademende en lichte sneaker gemaakt van verantwoord gewonnen eucalyptusboomvezels die zijdezacht en fris aanvoelt op je huid. Deze schoenen zijn perfect voor elke dag, om te wandelen, en bij warmer weer.

description: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.

localizedDescription.de-DE: Sein Material aus luftig-leichten Eukalyptusfasern macht den Tree Skipper zum überlegenen Segelschuh. Er wurde als Freizeitsneaker entworfen und eignet sich am besten für wärmeres Wetter.
localizedDescription.en-AU: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-CA: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-EU: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-GB: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-NZ: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-US: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fiber. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Tree Skipper est une version améliorée de la chaussure bateau, en fibre d'eucalyptus légère et aérée. Conçue pour être portée tous les jours de façon décontractée, elle est parfaite pour les températures qui grimpent.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Tree Skipper sono una versione migliorata delle scarpe da barca, realizzate in fibra di eucalipto leggera e traspirante. Pensate per essere indossate ogni giorno e perfette per le temperature più calde.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: Tree Skipperは、軽量で通気性の良いユーカリ繊維を使用したデッキシューズです。シルクのように滑らかな肌触りで、暖かい日のデイリー散歩やお出かけに最適です。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Tree Skipper는 가볍고 통기성이 뛰어난 유칼립투스 나무 섬유로 만든 보트 슈즈입니다. 따뜻한 날씨에 최적이며 데일리 캐주얼 웨어를 위한 디자인입니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Tree Skipper is een betere versie van de bekende bootschoen, gemaakt van lichte en ademende eucalyptusvezel. Ontworpen om elke dag te dragen en perfect voor warmer weer.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 我们的桉树船鞋丝滑透气，对环境负责的取材方式，让你轻松穿行各种生活场景。

description: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.

localizedDescription.de-DE: Sein Material aus luftig-leichten Eukalyptusfasern macht den Tree Skipper zum überlegenen Segelschuh. Er wurde als Freizeitsneaker entworfen und eignet sich am besten für wärmeres Wetter.
localizedDescription.en-AU: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-CA: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-EU: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-GB: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-NZ: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-US: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fiber. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Tree Skipper est une version améliorée de la chaussure bateau, en fibre d'eucalyptus légère et aérée. Conçue pour être portée tous les jours de façon décontractée, elle est parfaite pour les températures qui grimpent.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Tree Skipper sono una versione migliorata delle scarpe da barca, realizzate in fibra di eucalipto leggera e traspirante. Pensate per essere indossate ogni giorno e perfette per le temperature più calde.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: Tree Skipperは、軽量で通気性の良いユーカリ繊維を使用したデッキシューズです。シルクのように滑らかな肌触りで、暖かい日のデイリー散歩やお出かけに最適です。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Tree Skipper는 가볍고 통기성이 뛰어난 유칼립투스 나무 섬유로 만든 보트 슈즈입니다. 따뜻한 날씨에 최적이며 데일리 캐주얼 웨어를 위한 디자인입니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Tree Skipper is een betere versie van de bekende bootschoen, gemaakt van lichte en ademende eucalyptusvezel. Ontworpen om elke dag te dragen en perfect voor warmer weer.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 我们的桉树船鞋丝滑透气，对环境负责的取材方式，让你轻松穿行各种生活场景。

localizedDescription.en-AU: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-CA: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-EU: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-GB: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-NZ: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-US: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fiber. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Tree Skipper est une version améliorée de la chaussure bateau, en fibre d'eucalyptus légère et aérée. Conçue pour être portée tous les jours de façon décontractée, elle est parfaite pour les températures qui grimpent.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Tree Skipper sono una versione migliorata delle scarpe da barca, realizzate in fibra di eucalipto leggera e traspirante. Pensate per essere indossate ogni giorno e perfette per le temperature più calde.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: Tree Skipperは、軽量で通気性の良いユーカリ繊維を使用したデッキシューズです。シルクのように滑らかな肌触りで、暖かい日のデイリー散歩やお出かけに最適です。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Tree Skipper는 가볍고 통기성이 뛰어난 유칼립투스 나무 섬유로 만든 보트 슈즈입니다. 따뜻한 날씨에 최적이며 데일리 캐주얼 웨어를 위한 디자인입니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Tree Skipper is een betere versie van de bekende bootschoen, gemaakt van lichte en ademende eucalyptusvezel. Ontworpen om elke dag te dragen en perfect voor warmer weer.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 我们的桉树船鞋丝滑透气，对环境负责的取材方式，让你轻松穿行各种生活场景。

description: The Tree Topper is a minimalist high-top shoe made with lightweight, breathable eucalyptus fibre. Perfect for warmer weather walking and everyday casual wear.

localizedDescription.de-DE: Der Tree Topper ist ein minimalistischer, hoher Sneaker aus luftig-leichten Eukalyptusfasern. Er eignet sich am besten als Freizeitschuh bei wärmerem Wetter.
localizedDescription.en-AU: The Tree Topper is a minimalist high-top shoe made with lightweight, breathable eucalyptus fibre. Perfect for warmer weather walking and everyday casual wear.
localizedDescription.en-CA: The Tree Topper is a minimalist high-top shoe made with lightweight, breathable eucalyptus fibre. Perfect for warmer weather walking and everyday casual wear.
localizedDescription.en-EU: The Tree Topper is a minimalist high-top shoe made with lightweight, breathable eucalyptus fibre. Perfect for warmer weather walking and everyday casual wear.
localizedDescription.en-GB: The Tree Topper is a minimalist high-top shoe made with lightweight, breathable eucalyptus fibre. Perfect for warmer weather walking and everyday casual wear.
localizedDescription.en-NZ: The Tree Topper is a minimalist high-top shoe made with lightweight, breathable eucalyptus fibre. Perfect for warmer weather walking and everyday casual wear.
localizedDescription.en-US: The Tree Topper is a minimalist high-top shoe made with lightweight, breathable eucalyptus fiber. Perfect for warmer weather walking and everyday casual wear.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Tree Topper est une chaussure montante minimaliste conçue en fibre d'eucalyptus légère et aérée. Parfaite pour les promenades par temps chaud et les tenues décontractées au quotidien.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Tree Topper sono la nostra versione minimal delle sneakers alte, realizzate in fibra di eucalipto leggera e traspirante. Perfette per passeggiare anche quando fa caldo e da indossare ogni giorno.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: Tree Topper は、軽量で通気性の良いユーカリ繊維を使用したハイカットです。シルクのように滑らかな肌触りで、暖かい日の散歩やお出かけに最適です。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Tree Topper는 미니멀리스트 하이탑으로 가볍고 통기성이 뛰어난 유칼립투스 나무 섬유로 만들었습니다. 따뜻한 날씨에 적합하며 캐주얼 웨어에 완벽한 데일리 워킹화입니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Tree Topper is een minimalistische high-top schoen gemaakt van lichte, ademende eucalyptusvezel. Perfect voor wandelingen bij warmer weer en om elke dag te dragen.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 化繁为简的高帮休闲鞋，摒除了不必要的细节，令人耳目一新，适合天际线下遨游畅行。

description: The Tree Topper is a minimalist high-top shoe made with lightweight, breathable eucalyptus fibre. Perfect for warmer weather walking and everyday casual wear.

localizedDescription.de-DE: Der Tree Topper ist ein minimalistischer, hoher Sneaker aus luftig-leichten Eukalyptusfasern. Er eignet sich am besten als Freizeitschuh bei wärmerem Wetter.
localizedDescription.en-AU: The Tree Topper is a minimalist high-top shoe made with lightweight, breathable eucalyptus fibre. Perfect for warmer weather walking and everyday casual wear.
localizedDescription.en-CA: The Tree Topper is a minimalist high-top shoe made with lightweight, breathable eucalyptus fibre. Perfect for warmer weather walking and everyday casual wear.
localizedDescription.en-EU: The Tree Topper is a minimalist high-top shoe made with lightweight, breathable eucalyptus fibre. Perfect for warmer weather walking and everyday casual wear.
localizedDescription.en-GB: The Tree Topper is a minimalist high-top shoe made with lightweight, breathable eucalyptus fibre. Perfect for warmer weather walking and everyday casual wear.
localizedDescription.en-NZ: The Tree Topper is a minimalist high-top shoe made with lightweight, breathable eucalyptus fibre. Perfect for warmer weather walking and everyday casual wear.
localizedDescription.en-US: The Tree Topper is a minimalist high-top shoe made with lightweight, breathable eucalyptus fiber. Perfect for warmer weather walking and everyday casual wear.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Tree Topper est une chaussure montante minimaliste conçue en fibre d'eucalyptus légère et aérée. Parfaite pour les promenades par temps chaud et les tenues décontractées au quotidien.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Tree Topper sono la nostra versione minimal delle sneakers alte, realizzate in fibra di eucalipto leggera e traspirante. Perfette per passeggiare anche quando fa caldo e da indossare ogni giorno.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: Tree Topper は、軽量で通気性の良いユーカリ繊維を使用したハイカットです。シルクのように滑らかな肌触りで、暖かい日の散歩やお出かけに最適です。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Tree Topper는 미니멀리스트 하이탑으로 가볍고 통기성이 뛰어난 유칼립투스 나무 섬유로 만들었습니다. 따뜻한 날씨에 적합하며 캐주얼 웨어에 완벽한 데일리 워킹화입니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Tree Topper is een minimalistische high-top schoen gemaakt van lichte, ademende eucalyptusvezel. Perfect voor wandelingen bij warmer weer en om elke dag te dragen.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 化繁为简的高帮休闲鞋，摒除了不必要的细节，令人耳目一新，适合天际线下遨游畅行。

description: The Wool Piper is a classic low-top silhouette that's been reimagined for everyday casual wear while walking in cooler weather. It's made with soft, cosy, and comfortable natural materials, and is all about balancing simplicity and exaggeration for versatile styling.

localizedDescription.de-DE: Der Wool Piper ist ein klassischer, niedriger Sneaker, der sich am besten als Freizeitschuh bei kühlerem Wetter eignet. Er besteht aus weichen und bequemen natürlichen Materialien und passt dank seines simplen und doch trendigen Designs perfekt zu jedem Outfit.
localizedDescription.en-AU: The Wool Piper is a classic low-top silhouette that's been reimagined for everyday casual wear while walking in cooler weather. It's made with soft, cosy, and comfortable natural materials, and is all about balancing simplicity and exaggeration for versatile styling.
localizedDescription.en-CA: The Wool Piper is a classic low-top silhouette that's been reimagined for everyday casual wear while walking in cooler weather. It's made with soft, cosy, and comfortable natural materials, and is all about balancing simplicity and exaggeration for versatile styling.
localizedDescription.en-EU: The Wool Piper is a classic low-top silhouette that's been reimagined for everyday casual wear while walking in cooler weather. It's made with soft, cosy, and comfortable natural materials, and is all about balancing simplicity and exaggeration for versatile styling.
localizedDescription.en-GB: The Wool Piper is a classic low-top silhouette that's been reimagined for everyday casual wear while walking in cooler weather. It's made with soft, cosy, and comfortable natural materials, and is all about balancing simplicity and exaggeration for versatile styling.
localizedDescription.en-NZ: The Wool Piper is a classic low-top silhouette that's been reimagined for everyday casual wear while walking in cooler weather. It's made with soft, cosy, and comfortable natural materials, and is all about balancing simplicity and exaggeration for versatile styling.
localizedDescription.en-US: The Wool Piper is a classic low-top silhouette that's been reimagined for everyday casual wear while walking in cooler weather. It's made with soft, cozy, and comfortable natural materials, and is all about balancing simplicity and exaggeration for versatile styling.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Wool Piper est une chaussure basse au look intemporel qui a été réimaginée pour un quotidien décontracté lors de vos promenades par temps frais. Elle est conçue en matériaux naturels doux, cosy et peut être portée avec différents looks.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Wool Piper sono un modello basso dalla linea classica reinventato per essere indossato ogni giorno e passeggiare quando fa freddo. Sono realizzate in materiali naturali morbidi, caldi e comodi. L’equilibrio perfetto tra semplicità e audacia, per uno stile versatile.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: Wool Piperは、クラシックなデザインを洗練させたローカットスニーカー。柔らかくて肌触りの良い天然素材を使用し、特徴的なディティールとシンプルさをバランスよく取り入れました。どんなコーディネートとも相性がよく、普段使いにぴったりです。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Wool Piper는 클래식 로우탑 디자인을 재해석한 쌀쌀한 날씨에 적합한 데일리 캐주얼웨어입니다. 부드럽고 포근한 천연 소재로 만든 어디에나 어울리는 조화로운 디자인을 자랑하는 신발입니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Wool Piper is een klassiek low-top silhouet ideaal voor frissere dagen. De comfortabele schoen is gemaakt van zachte, natuurlijke materialen en kun je zowel eenvoudig en veelzijdig stylen.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 用天然材料重塑经典鞋型，平衡简单风格和多样穿搭场景，妥帖你的百变日常。

localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Wool Piper sono un modello basso dalla linea classica reinventato per essere indossato ogni giorno e passeggiare quando fa freddo. Sono realizzate in materiali naturali morbidi, caldi e comodi. L’equilibrio perfetto tra semplicità e audacia, per uno stile versatile.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: Wool Piperは、クラシックなデザインを洗練させたローカットスニーカー。柔らかくて肌触りの良い天然素材を使用し、特徴的なディティールとシンプルさをバランスよく取り入れました。どんなコーディネートとも相性がよく、普段使いにぴったりです。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Wool Piper는 클래식 로우탑 디자인을 재해석한 쌀쌀한 날씨에 적합한 데일리 캐주얼웨어입니다. 부드럽고 포근한 천연 소재로 만든 어디에나 어울리는 조화로운 디자인을 자랑하는 신발입니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Wool Piper is een klassiek low-top silhouet ideaal voor frissere dagen. De comfortabele schoen is gemaakt van zachte, natuurlijke materialen en kun je zowel eenvoudig en veelzijdig stylen.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 用天然材料重塑经典鞋型，平衡简单风格和多样穿搭场景，妥帖你的百变日常。

localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Wool Piper sono un modello basso dalla linea classica reinventato per essere indossato ogni giorno e passeggiare quando fa freddo. Sono realizzate in materiali naturali morbidi, caldi e comodi. L’equilibrio perfetto tra semplicità e audacia, per uno stile versatile.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: Wool Piperは、クラシックなデザインを洗練させたローカットスニーカー。柔らかくて肌触りの良い天然素材を使用し、特徴的なディティールとシンプルさをバランスよく取り入れました。どんなコーディネートとも相性がよく、普段使いにぴったりです。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Wool Piper는 클래식 로우탑 디자인을 재해석한 쌀쌀한 날씨에 적합한 데일리 캐주얼웨어입니다. 부드럽고 포근한 천연 소재로 만든 어디에나 어울리는 조화로운 디자인을 자랑하는 신발입니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Wool Piper is een klassiek low-top silhouet ideaal voor frissere dagen. De comfortabele schoen is gemaakt van zachte, natuurlijke materialen en kun je zowel eenvoudig en veelzijdig stylen.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 用天然材料重塑经典鞋型，平衡简单风格和多样穿搭场景，妥帖你的百变日常。

description: The Allbirds Wool Runner Fluff is a twist on our best-selling wool sneaker. It's outrageously soft and cozy, flexible, supportive, and machine washable. The Wool Runner Fluff is comfortable, lightweight, and can be worn sockless. Best used for walking, cooler weather, and everyday casual wear.

localizedDescription.de-DE: Der Allbirds Wool Runner Fluff ist die flauschige Ausgabe unseres beliebten Wollsneakers. Er bietet genügend Halt, ist unfassbar weich, gemütlich und vielseitig und praktischerweise auch noch waschmaschinenfest. Der Wool Runner Fluff ist leicht und bequem und kann auch ohne Socken getragen werden. Am besten eignet er sich als Freizeitschuh bei kühlerem Wetter.
localizedDescription.en-GB: The Allbirds Wool Runner Fluff is a twist on our best-selling wool sneaker. It's outrageously soft and cozy, flexible, supportive, and machine washable. The Wool Runner Fluff is comfortable, lightweight, and can be worn sockless. Best used for walking, cooler weather, and everyday casual wear.
localizedDescription.en-US: The Allbirds Wool Runner Fluff is a twist on our best-selling wool sneaker. It's outrageously soft and cozy, flexible, supportive, and machine washable. The Wool Runner Fluff is comfortable, lightweight, and can be worn sockless. Best used for walking, cooler weather, and everyday casual wear.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Wool Runner Fluff d'Allbirds est une variante de notre chaussure en laine la plus vendue. Elle est incroyablement douce et cosy, flexible, souple et lavable en machine. La Wool Runner Fluff est confortable, légère et peut être portée sans chaussettes. Elle est idéale pour la marche, le temps plus frais et les tenues décontractées au quotidien.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Allbirds Wool Runner Fluff sono una rivisitazione delle nostre sneakers in lana più vendute. Sono incredibilmente morbide e calde, flessibili, di supporto e lavabili in lavatrice. Le Wool Runner Fluff sono comode, leggere e possono essere indossate senza calze. Sono ideali per camminare, nelle giornate di freddo e per un look casual giornaliero.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: 定番のウールスニーカーにアレンジを加えた、Wool Runner Fluff。うっとりする肌触り、柔軟性、サポート力、洗濯機で洗えることが特徴です。軽くて履き心地が良く、靴下なしでもとっても快適。涼しい日のウォーキングやお出かけに最適です。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: 올버즈 Wool Runner Fluff는 베스트셀러 울 스니커즈의 색다른 모습을 보여줍니다. 신축성과 지지력이 뛰어나며 놀랍도록 부드러운 기계 세탁 사용이 가능한 신발입니다. 또한 통기성이 뛰어나고 가벼우며 양말 없이도 신을 수 있습니다. 워킹화로 최적이며 쌀쌀한 날씨나 데일리 캐주얼웨어에 완벽합니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Allbirds Wool Runner Fluff is een twist op onze best verkochte wollen sneaker. De Wool Runner Fluff is buitengewoon zacht en knus, flexibel, ondersteunend en machinewasbaar. De Wool Runner Fluff is ademend, licht en kan zonder sokken worden gedragen. Ideaal om te wandelen, bij frisser weer, en past bij elke casual look.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 天然美利奴羊打造限定款 Wool Runner Fluff，外部茸软如乖顺小羊，内部亲肤不刺痒。
localizedDescription.en-AU: The Allbirds Wool Runner Fluff is a twist on our best-selling wool sneaker. It's outrageously soft and cozy, flexible, supportive, and machine washable. The Wool Runner Fluff is comfortable, lightweight, and can be worn sockless. Best used for walking, cooler weather, and everyday casual wear.

description: The Wool Runner Mizzle is our rain-ready sneaker that keeps your feet warm, cosy, and dry in unpredictable weather. Cosy ZQ Merino Wool is combined with our bio-based water repellent shield so you can walk comfortably in the rain. These shoes are great everyday shoes, with all condition traction to grip slippery surfaces.

localizedDescription.de-DE: Der Wool Runner Mizzle ist unser regenfester Sneaker, der deine Füße bei jedem Wetter warm und trocken hält. Er besteht aus weicher ZQ-Merinowolle, die mit einer biobasierten, wasserabweisenden Schutzschicht behandelt wurde, dank der du auch im Regen stets beschwingten Schrittes unterwegs bist. Diese Schuhe sind ideale Freizeitschuhe, deren Sohlen sicheren Halt auf rutschigem Untergrund bieten.
localizedDescription.en-AU: The Wool Runner Mizzle is our rain-ready sneaker that keeps your feet warm, cosy, and dry in unpredictable weather. These shoes are great everyday shoes, with all condition traction to grip slippery surfaces.

These shoes are great everyday shoes, with all condition traction to grip slippery surfaces.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Wool Runner Mizzle est notre basket pour la pluie qui garde vos pieds au chaud et sec par tous les temps. La laine mérinos ZQ confortable est combinée à notre bouclier déperlant biologique pour que vous puissiez marcher confortablement sous la pluie. Ces chaussures sont idéales pour tous les jours, avec une traction en toutes circonstances pour adhérer sur les surfaces glissantes.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Wool Runner Mizzle sono le nostre sneakers impermeabili, perfette per tenere i piedi al caldo, comodi e asciutti quando il tempo è imprevedibile. La lana merino ZQ morbida e calda è rivestita con la nostra membrana idrorepellente di origine naturale, per passeggiare senza problemi sotto la pioggia. Sono scarpe ideali da indossare ogni giorno e che aderiscono su tutte le superfici, anche le più scivolose.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: ウールランナーミズルは天然素材のレインスニーカー。雨の日でも足を暖かく、ドライに保ちます。天然由来の撥水シールドを施したZQメリノウールのアッパーや、滑りやすい路面にも対応する天然ゴムの靴底が、あなたの雨の日を快適にします。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Wool Runner Mizzle은 변덕스러운 날씨에도 발을 따뜻하고 보송하게 유지해 주는 웨더 스니커즈입니다. 젖은 날씨에도 포근한 ZQ 메리노 울과 바이오 기반의 발수 쉴드가 당신의 발을 보호합니다. 미끄러운 노면에서 훌륭한 접지력을 자랑하는 데일리 신발입니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Wool Runner Mizzle is onze regenbestendige sneaker die je voeten warm, knus en droog houdt tijdens onvoorspelbaar weer. De knusse ZQ Merinowol wordt gecombineerd met onze bio-based waterafstotende beschermlaag zodat je comfortabel in de regen kunt lopen. Deze schoenen zijn ideaal voor elke dag. Grip in alle omstandigheden, ook op gladde oppervlakken.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 此款全新Wool Runner晴雨鞋延续经典休闲鞋简约设计，以柔软舒适的美利奴羊毛为面料，利用天然橡胶鞋底加深底部纹路，结合Puddle Guard™防泼水涂层面料，让阴雨季节也内心晴朗。

localizedDescription.en-AU: The Wool Runner Mizzle is our rain-ready sneaker that keeps your feet warm, cosy, and dry in unpredictable weather. Cosy ZQ Merino Wool is combined with our bio-based water repellent shield so you can walk comfortably in the rain. These shoes are great everyday shoes, with all condition traction to grip slippery surfaces.

Cozy ZQ Merino Wool is combined with our bio-based water repellent shield so you can walk comfortably in the rain. These shoes are great everyday shoes, with all condition traction to grip slippery surfaces.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Wool Runner Mizzle est notre basket pour la pluie qui garde vos pieds au chaud et sec par tous les temps. La laine mérinos ZQ confortable est combinée à notre bouclier déperlant biologique pour que vous puissiez marcher confortablement sous la pluie. Ces chaussures sont idéales pour tous les jours, avec une traction en toutes circonstances pour adhérer sur les surfaces glissantes.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Wool Runner Mizzle sono le nostre sneakers impermeabili, perfette per tenere i piedi al caldo, comodi e asciutti quando il tempo è imprevedibile. La lana merino ZQ morbida e calda è rivestita con la nostra membrana idrorepellente di origine naturale, per passeggiare senza problemi sotto la pioggia. Sono scarpe ideali da indossare ogni giorno e che aderiscono su tutte le superfici, anche le più scivolose.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: ウールランナーミズルは天然素材のレインスニーカー。雨の日でも足を暖かく、ドライに保ちます。天然由来の撥水シールドを施したZQメリノウールのアッパーや、滑りやすい路面にも対応する天然ゴムの靴底が、あなたの雨の日を快適にします。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Wool Runner Mizzle은 변덕스러운 날씨에도 발을 따뜻하고 보송하게 유지해 주는 웨더 스니커즈입니다. 젖은 날씨에도 포근한 ZQ 메리노 울과 바이오 기반의 발수 쉴드가 당신의 발을 보호합니다. 미끄러운 노면에서 훌륭한 접지력을 자랑하는 데일리 신발입니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Wool Runner Mizzle is onze regenbestendige sneaker die je voeten warm, knus en droog houdt tijdens onvoorspelbaar weer. De knusse ZQ Merinowol wordt gecombineerd met onze bio-based waterafstotende beschermlaag zodat je comfortabel in de regen kunt lopen. Deze schoenen zijn ideaal voor elke dag. Grip in alle omstandigheden, ook op gladde oppervlakken.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 此款全新Wool Runner晴雨鞋延续经典休闲鞋简约设计，以柔软舒适的美利奴羊毛为面料，利用天然橡胶鞋底加深底部纹路，结合Puddle Guard™防泼水涂层面料，让阴雨季节也内心晴朗。

Diese Schuhe sind ideale Freizeitschuhe, deren Sohlen sicheren Halt auf rutschigem Untergrund bieten.
localizedDescription.en-AU: The Wool Runner Mizzle is our rain-ready sneaker that keeps your feet warm, cosy, and dry in unpredictable weather. Cosy ZQ Merino Wool is combined with our bio-based water repellent shield so you can walk comfortably in the rain. These shoes are great everyday shoes, with all condition traction to grip slippery surfaces.

These shoes are great everyday shoes, with all condition traction to grip slippery surfaces.

localizedDescription.en-US: The Wool Runner Mizzle is our rain-ready sneaker that keeps your feet warm, cozy, and dry in unpredictable weather. Cozy ZQ Merino Wool is combined with our bio-based water repellent shield so you can walk comfortably in the rain. These shoes are great everyday shoes, with all condition traction to grip slippery surfaces.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Wool Runner Mizzle est notre basket pour la pluie qui garde vos pieds au chaud et sec par tous les temps. La laine mérinos ZQ confortable est combinée à notre bouclier déperlant biologique pour que vous puissiez marcher confortablement sous la pluie. Ces chaussures sont idéales pour tous les jours, avec une traction en toutes circonstances pour adhérer sur les surfaces glissantes.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Wool Runner Mizzle sono le nostre sneakers impermeabili, perfette per tenere i piedi al caldo, comodi e asciutti quando il tempo è imprevedibile. La lana merino ZQ morbida e calda è rivestita con la nostra membrana idrorepellente di origine naturale, per passeggiare senza problemi sotto la pioggia. Sono scarpe ideali da indossare ogni giorno e che aderiscono su tutte le superfici, anche le più scivolose.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: ウールランナーミズルは天然素材のレインスニーカー。雨の日でも足を暖かく、ドライに保ちます。天然由来の撥水シールドを施したZQメリノウールのアッパーや、滑りやすい路面にも対応する天然ゴムの靴底が、あなたの雨の日を快適にします。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Wool Runner Mizzle은 변덕스러운 날씨에도 발을 따뜻하고 보송하게 유지해 주는 웨더 스니커즈입니다. 젖은 날씨에도 포근한 ZQ 메리노 울과 바이오 기반의 발수 쉴드가 당신의 발을 보호합니다. 미끄러운 노면에서 훌륭한 접지력을 자랑하는 데일리 신발입니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Wool Runner Mizzle is onze regenbestendige sneaker die je voeten warm, knus en droog houdt tijdens onvoorspelbaar weer. De knusse ZQ Merinowol wordt gecombineerd met onze bio-based waterafstotende beschermlaag zodat je comfortabel in de regen kunt lopen. Deze schoenen zijn ideaal voor elke dag. Grip in alle omstandigheden, ook op gladde oppervlakken.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 此款全新Wool Runner晴雨鞋延续经典休闲鞋简约设计，以柔软舒适的美利奴羊毛为面料，利用天然橡胶鞋底加深底部纹路，结合Puddle Guard™防泼水涂层面料，让阴雨季节也内心晴朗。

Er besteht aus weicher ZQ-Merinowolle, die mit einer biobasierten, wasserabweisenden Schutzschicht behandelt wurde, dank der du auch im Regen stets beschwingten Schrittes unterwegs bist. Diese Schuhe sind ideale Freizeitschuhe, deren Sohlen sicheren Halt auf rutschigem Untergrund bieten.

These shoes are great everyday shoes, with all condition traction to grip slippery surfaces.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Wool Runner Mizzle est notre basket pour la pluie qui garde vos pieds au chaud et sec par tous les temps. La laine mérinos ZQ confortable est combinée à notre bouclier déperlant biologique pour que vous puissiez marcher confortablement sous la pluie. Ces chaussures sont idéales pour tous les jours, avec une traction en toutes circonstances pour adhérer sur les surfaces glissantes.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Wool Runner Mizzle sono le nostre sneakers impermeabili, perfette per tenere i piedi al caldo, comodi e asciutti quando il tempo è imprevedibile. La lana merino ZQ morbida e calda è rivestita con la nostra membrana idrorepellente di origine naturale, per passeggiare senza problemi sotto la pioggia. Sono scarpe ideali da indossare ogni giorno e che aderiscono su tutte le superfici, anche le più scivolose.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: ウールランナーミズルは天然素材のレインスニーカー。雨の日でも足を暖かく、ドライに保ちます。天然由来の撥水シールドを施したZQメリノウールのアッパーや、滑りやすい路面にも対応する天然ゴムの靴底が、あなたの雨の日を快適にします。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Wool Runner Mizzle은 변덕스러운 날씨에도 발을 따뜻하고 보송하게 유지해 주는 웨더 스니커즈입니다. 젖은 날씨에도 포근한 ZQ 메리노 울과 바이오 기반의 발수 쉴드가 당신의 발을 보호합니다. 미끄러운 노면에서 훌륭한 접지력을 자랑하는 데일리 신발입니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Wool Runner Mizzle is onze regenbestendige sneaker die je voeten warm, knus en droog houdt tijdens onvoorspelbaar weer. De knusse ZQ Merinowol wordt gecombineerd met onze bio-based waterafstotende beschermlaag zodat je comfortabel in de regen kunt lopen. Deze schoenen zijn ideaal voor elke dag. Grip in alle omstandigheden, ook op gladde oppervlakken.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 此款全新Wool Runner晴雨鞋延续经典休闲鞋简约设计，以柔软舒适的美利奴羊毛为面料，利用天然橡胶鞋底加深底部纹路，结合Puddle Guard™防泼水涂层面料，让阴雨季节也内心晴朗。

description: The Allbirds Wool Runner is the orginal wool sneaker that started it all. Called the world's most comfortable shoe, it's flexible, supportive, astonishingly soft, and machine washable. The Wool Runner is breathable, lightweight, and can be worn sockless. Best used for walking, cooler weather, and everyday casual wear.

description: The Allbirds Wool Runner is the orginal wool sneaker that started it all. Called the world's most comfortable shoe, it's flexible, supportive, astonishingly soft, and machine washable. The Wool Runner is breathable, lightweight, and can be worn sockless. Best used for walking, cooler weather, and everyday casual wear.

localizedDescription.de-DE: Der Allbirds Wool Runner ist unser Original-Sneaker aus Wolle, mit dem alles angefangen hat. Er wird oft als der bequemste Schuh der Welt bezeichnet, denn er bietet genügend Halt, ist vielseitig, weich und praktischerweise auch noch waschmaschinenfest. Der Wool Runner ist luftig und leicht und kann auch ohne Socken getragen werden. Am besten eignet er sich als Freizeitschuh bei kühlerem Wetter.
localizedDescription.en-US: The Allbirds Wool Runner is the orginal wool sneaker that started it all. Called the world's most comfortable shoe, it's flexible, supportive, astonishingly soft, and machine washable. The Wool Runner is breathable, lightweight, and can be worn sockless. Best used for walking, cooler weather, and everyday casual wear.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Wool Runner d'Allbirds est la basket en laine par laquelle tout a commencé. Appelée la chaussure la plus confortable du monde, elle est flexible, souple, étonnamment douce et lavable en machine. La Wool Runner est aérée, légère et peut être portée sans chaussettes. Elle est idéale pour la marche, les temps plus frais et les tenues décontractées au quotidien.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Allbirds Wool Runner sono le sneakers originali in lana da cui tutto ha avuto inizio. Famose per essere le scarpe più comode del mondo, sono flessibili, di supporto, incredibilmente morbide e lavabili in lavatrice. Le Wool Runner sono traspiranti, leggere e possono essere indossate senza calze. Sono ideali per camminare, nelle giornate di freddo e per un look casual giornaliero.

description: The Allbirds Wool Runner is the orginal wool sneaker that started it all. Called the world's most comfortable shoe, it's flexible, supportive, astonishingly soft, and machine washable. The Wool Runner is breathable, lightweight, and can be worn sockless. Best used for walking, cooler weather, and everyday casual wear.

localizedDescription.de-DE: Der Allbirds Wool Runner ist unser Original-Sneaker aus Wolle, mit dem alles angefangen hat. Er wird oft als der bequemste Schuh der Welt bezeichnet, denn er bietet genügend Halt, ist vielseitig, weich und praktischerweise auch noch waschmaschinenfest. Der Wool Runner ist luftig und leicht und kann auch ohne Socken getragen werden. Am besten eignet er sich als Freizeitschuh bei kühlerem Wetter.
localizedDescription.en-US: The Allbirds Wool Runner is the orginal wool sneaker that started it all. Called the world's most comfortable shoe, it's flexible, supportive, astonishingly soft, and machine washable. The Wool Runner is breathable, lightweight, and can be worn sockless. Best used for walking, cooler weather, and everyday casual wear.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Wool Runner d'Allbirds est la basket en laine par laquelle tout a commencé. Appelée la chaussure la plus confortable du monde, elle est flexible, souple, étonnamment douce et lavable en machine. La Wool Runner est aérée, légère et peut être portée sans chaussettes. Elle est idéale pour la marche, les temps plus frais et les tenues décontractées au quotidien.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Allbirds Wool Runner sono le sneakers originali in lana da cui tutto ha avuto inizio. Famose per essere le scarpe più comode del mondo, sono flessibili, di supporto, incredibilmente morbide e lavabili in lavatrice. Le Wool Runner sono traspiranti, leggere e possono essere indossate senza calze. Sono ideali per camminare, nelle giornate di freddo e per un look casual giornaliero.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: Wool Runnerは、オールバーズのはじまりの1足。「世界で最も快適な靴」と呼ばれ、うっとりする肌触り、柔軟性、サポート力、そして洗濯機で洗えることが特徴です。軽くて通気性にも優れており、靴下なしでもとっても快適。涼しい日のウォーキングやお出かけに最適です。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Wool Runner는 올버즈의 시작이었습니다. 세상에서 가장 편한 신발이라는 애칭과 함께 신축성과 지지력이 뛰어나며 놀랍도록 부드러운 기계 세탁 사용이 가능한 신발입니다. 또한 통기성이 뛰어나고 가벼우며 양말 없이도 신을 수 있습니다. 워킹화로 최적이며 쌀쌀한 날씨나 데일리 캐주얼웨어에 완벽합니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Allbirds Wool Runner is de originele wollen sneaker waar het allemaal mee begon. De Wool Runner wordt ook wel 's werelds meest comfortabele schoen genoemd. Hij is flexibel, ondersteunend, verbazingwekkend zacht en machinewasbaar. De Wool Runner is ademend, licht en kan zonder sokken worden gedragen. Ideaal om te wandelen, bij frisser weer, en past bij elke casual look.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 经典出众的时尚休闲鞋，拥有天然的柔软性和舒适度，让您行动自如。

Best used for walking, cooler weather, and everyday casual wear.

description: The Allbirds Wool Runner is the orginal wool sneaker that started it all. Called the world's most comfortable shoe, it's flexible, supportive, astonishingly soft, and machine washable. The Wool Runner is breathable, lightweight, and can be worn sockless. Best used for walking, cooler weather, and everyday casual wear.

localizedDescription.de-DE: Der Allbirds Wool Runner ist unser Original-Sneaker aus Wolle, mit dem alles angefangen hat. Er wird oft als der bequemste Schuh der Welt bezeichnet, denn er bietet genügend Halt, ist vielseitig, weich und praktischerweise auch noch waschmaschinenfest. Der Wool Runner ist luftig und leicht und kann auch ohne Socken getragen werden. Am besten eignet er sich als Freizeitschuh bei kühlerem Wetter.
localizedDescription.en-US: The Allbirds Wool Runner is the orginal wool sneaker that started it all. Called the world's most comfortable shoe, it's flexible, supportive, astonishingly soft, and machine washable. The Wool Runner is breathable, lightweight, and can be worn sockless. Best used for walking, cooler weather, and everyday casual wear.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Wool Runner d'Allbirds est la basket en laine par laquelle tout a commencé. Appelée la chaussure la plus confortable du monde, elle est flexible, souple, étonnamment douce et lavable en machine. La Wool Runner est aérée, légère et peut être portée sans chaussettes. Elle est idéale pour la marche, les temps plus frais et les tenues décontractées au quotidien.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Allbirds Wool Runner sono le sneakers originali in lana da cui tutto ha avuto inizio. Famose per essere le scarpe più comode del mondo, sono flessibili, di supporto, incredibilmente morbide e lavabili in lavatrice. Le Wool Runner sono traspiranti, leggere e possono essere indossate senza calze. Sono ideali per camminare, nelle giornate di freddo e per un look casual giornaliero.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: Wool Runnerは、オールバーズのはじまりの1足。「世界で最も快適な靴」と呼ばれ、うっとりする肌触り、柔軟性、サポート力、そして洗濯機で洗えることが特徴です。軽くて通気性にも優れており、靴下なしでもとっても快適。涼しい日のウォーキングやお出かけに最適です。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Wool Runner는 올버즈의 시작이었습니다. 세상에서 가장 편한 신발이라는 애칭과 함께 신축성과 지지력이 뛰어나며 놀랍도록 부드러운 기계 세탁 사용이 가능한 신발입니다. 또한 통기성이 뛰어나고 가벼우며 양말 없이도 신을 수 있습니다. 워킹화로 최적이며 쌀쌀한 날씨나 데일리 캐주얼웨어에 완벽합니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Allbirds Wool Runner is de originele wollen sneaker waar het allemaal mee begon. De Wool Runner wordt ook wel 's werelds meest comfortabele schoen genoemd. Hij is flexibel, ondersteunend, verbazingwekkend zacht en machinewasbaar. De Wool Runner is ademend, licht en kan zonder sokken worden gedragen. Ideaal om te wandelen, bij frisser weer, en past bij elke casual look.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 经典出众的时尚休闲鞋，拥有天然的柔软性和舒适度，让您行动自如。
localizedDescription.en-GB: The Allbirds Wool Runner is the orginal wool sneaker that started it all. Called the world's most comfortable shoe, it's flexible, supportive, astonishingly soft, and machine washable. The Wool Runner is breathable, lightweight, and can be worn sockless. Best used for walking, cooler weather, and everyday casual wear.

description: The Allbirds Wool Runner is the orginal wool sneaker that started it all. Called the world's most comfortable shoe, it's flexible, supportive, astonishingly soft, and machine washable. The Wool Runner is breathable, lightweight, and can be worn sockless. Best used for walking, cooler weather, and everyday casual wear.

localizedDescription.de-DE: Der Allbirds Wool Runner ist unser Original-Sneaker aus Wolle, mit dem alles angefangen hat. Er wird oft als der bequemste Schuh der Welt bezeichnet, denn er bietet genügend Halt, ist vielseitig, weich und praktischerweise auch noch waschmaschinenfest. Der Wool Runner ist luftig und leicht und kann auch ohne Socken getragen werden. Am besten eignet er sich als Freizeitschuh bei kühlerem Wetter.
localizedDescription.en-US: The Allbirds Wool Runner is the orginal wool sneaker that started it all. Called the world's most comfortable shoe, it's flexible, supportive, astonishingly soft, and machine washable. The Wool Runner is breathable, lightweight, and can be worn sockless. Best used for walking, cooler weather, and everyday casual wear.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Wool Runner d'Allbirds est la basket en laine par laquelle tout a commencé. Appelée la chaussure la plus confortable du monde, elle est flexible, souple, étonnamment douce et lavable en machine. La Wool Runner est aérée, légère et peut être portée sans chaussettes. Elle est idéale pour la marche, les temps plus frais et les tenues décontractées au quotidien.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Allbirds Wool Runner sono le sneakers originali in lana da cui tutto ha avuto inizio. Famose per essere le scarpe più comode del mondo, sono flessibili, di supporto, incredibilmente morbide e lavabili in lavatrice. Le Wool Runner sono traspiranti, leggere e possono essere indossate senza calze. Sono ideali per camminare, nelle giornate di freddo e per un look casual giornaliero.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: Wool Runnerは、オールバーズのはじまりの1足。「世界で最も快適な靴」と呼ばれ、うっとりする肌触り、柔軟性、サポート力、そして洗濯機で洗えることが特徴です。軽くて通気性にも優れており、靴下なしでもとっても快適。涼しい日のウォーキングやお出かけに最適です。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Wool Runner는 올버즈의 시작이었습니다. 세상에서 가장 편한 신발이라는 애칭과 함께 신축성과 지지력이 뛰어나며 놀랍도록 부드러운 기계 세탁 사용이 가능한 신발입니다. 또한 통기성이 뛰어나고 가벼우며 양말 없이도 신을 수 있습니다. 워킹화로 최적이며 쌀쌀한 날씨나 데일리 캐주얼웨어에 완벽합니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Allbirds Wool Runner is de originele wollen sneaker waar het allemaal mee begon. De Wool Runner wordt ook wel 's werelds meest comfortabele schoen genoemd. Hij is flexibel, ondersteunend, verbazingwekkend zacht en machinewasbaar. De Wool Runner is ademend, licht en kan zonder sokken worden gedragen. Ideaal om te wandelen, bij frisser weer, en past bij elke casual look.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 经典出众的时尚休闲鞋，拥有天然的柔软性和舒适度，让您行动自如。

description: The Wool Runner-up Mizzle is a wet-weather high top made with ZQ Merino wool and a bio-based water repellent shield, so your feet stay dry and cozy no matter what the weather is.

localizedDescription.de-DE: Der Wool Runner-up Mizzle ist ein wetterfester hoher Sneaker, der aus Merinowolle besteht und über eine biobasierte, wasserabweisende Schutzschicht verfügt, die deine Füße bei jedem Wetter warm und trocken hält.
localizedDescription.en-US: The Wool Runner-up Mizzle is a wet-weather high top made with ZQ Merino wool and a bio-based water repellent shield, so your feet stay dry and cozy no matter what the weather is.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Wool Runner-up Mizzle est l'indispensable pour temps pluvieux, conçue en laine mérinos ZQ et doté d'un bouclier déperlant d'origine biologique, afin que vos pieds restent secs et confortables, quelle que soit la météo.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Wool Runner-up Mizzle sono le nostre sneakers alte impermeabili realizzate in lana merino ZQ rivestita da una membrana idrorepellente di origine naturale. I piedi resteranno asciutti e al caldo in qualsiasi condizione.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: Wool Runner-up Mizzleは、ZQメリノウールのアッパーに天然由来の撥水シールドを施した雨の日用ハイカットスニーカー。ちょっとした雨の日でも足を暖かく、ドライに快適に保ちます。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Wool Runner-up Mizzle은 ZQ 메리노 울과 바이오 기반의 발수 쉴드로 만든 우천에 완벽한 하이탑 스니커즈입니다. 어떤 날씨에도 보송하고 따뜻한 발을 유지하세요.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Wool Runner-up Mizzle is ideaal bij regenachtig weer, gemaakt van ZQ Merinowol met een bio-based waterafstotende beschermlaag zodat je voeten droog en warm blijven tijdens alle weersomstandigheden.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 此款全新高帮晴雨鞋以柔软舒适的美利奴羊毛为面料，利用天然橡胶鞋底加深底部纹路，结合Puddle Guard™防泼水涂层面料，带你发现雨天的美好。

localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Wool Runner-up Mizzle sono le nostre sneakers alte impermeabili realizzate in lana merino ZQ rivestita da una membrana idrorepellente di origine naturale. I piedi resteranno asciutti e al caldo in qualsiasi condizione.

localizedDescription.ja-JP: Wool Runner-up Mizzleは、ZQメリノウールのアッパーに天然由来の撥水シールドを施した雨の日用ハイカットスニーカー。ちょっとした雨の日でも足を暖かく、ドライに快適に保ちます。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Wool Runner-up Mizzle은 ZQ 메리노 울과 바이오 기반의 발수 쉴드로 만든 우천에 완벽한 하이탑 스니커즈입니다. 어떤 날씨에도 보송하고 따뜻한 발을 유지하세요.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Wool Runner-up Mizzle is ideaal bij regenachtig weer, gemaakt van ZQ Merinowol met een bio-based waterafstotende beschermlaag zodat je voeten droog en warm blijven tijdens alle weersomstandigheden.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 此款全新高帮晴雨鞋以柔软舒适的美利奴羊毛为面料，利用天然橡胶鞋底加深底部纹路，结合Puddle Guard™防泼水涂层面料，带你发现雨天的美好。
localizedDescription.en-GB: The Wool Runner-up Mizzle is a wet-weather high top made with ZQ Merino wool and a bio-based water repellent shield, so your feet stay dry and cozy no matter what the weather is.
